 # CRbasic350

 > CRBasic 3.50 series — Documentation for CRBasic 3.50-series dataloggers. This folder contains instruction references, parameter references, skins, and terms for devices running the 3.50 firmware series.

Important notes:

- CRBasic 3.50 documentation may include features not present in earlier series. Use the companion enumerator files for exhaustive instruction and parameter lists.

## Docs — Info files (complete list)

## Instructions (complete)

- Primary instruction reference: see `./instructions-llms.txt` (companion file with a complete, alphabetized list of the `Instructions/` docs).

## Parameters (complete)

- Primary parameter reference: see `./parameters-llms.txt` (companion file with a complete, alphabetized list of the `parameters/` docs).
